data.description:
Play as a lunarnaut/repair-person, tasked with fulfilling the ridiculous demands of President of the World, Doug-Slater Roccmeier, to build his massively unstable moon elevator. Obey his increasingly goofy orders to the letter, disobey and cause hilarious havoc, or find your own sweet spot. Each way of playing has its own advantages and outcomes. It’s up to you, intrepid elevator person, to blaze your own altitudinal path...to the moon!


Features include:

• Episode X! Brand new full Episode!
• Unlock! A thrilling arcade game from the President’s past: Bat Batty Bats!
• Discover! More weapons by playing through Elevator... to the Moon!
• Exploration! The elevator has heaps of stuff Roccmeier doesn’t want you to find.
• Beat your buddies! Online Scoreboards and Endless mode for each stage!
• More! More collectibles, more story, more replay-ability, more.. More!

UPDATES: 
72Hz Mode Enabled in "High" Setting
SNAP TURNING
-Hold the trigger
-Click Touch Pad, swipe left or right

changelog.change_log:
SNAP TURNING ADDED!
By popular demand, we've added snap turning for maximum comfort. 
-Hold the trigger you'll see the cursor change
-Click Touchpad and swipe left or right to snap turn in either direction.

- Elevator... to the Moon! Turbo Champ Edition: Bat Batty Bats
- Latest Oculus Utilities 1.25.2
- Subtitles Update
- Multi-Pass Rendering
- Quit Game Button in Main Menu
- 72hz Mode!

- Elevator... to the Moon! Turbo Champ Edition: Bat Batty Bats
- Latest Oculus Utilities 1.24
- Subtitles in new loading screens fix
- Multi-Pass
- Quit Game Button in Main Menu

- Added Subtitles-Support for French, Spanish and German
- Quality of Life Bugfixes and Improvements

- Added Subtitles for all the Dialogue
- New stuff to hang on the hook!
- Few more Easter eggs :) 
- Tons of Improvements and Bugfixes

- Enabled GPU skinning and IL2CPP for better CPU performance
- Small Bugfixes for Achievement System
